Title: Requires ticket distributors to refund the purchase price of tickets within forty-five days after a cancelled or rescheduled event
Summary: Requires ticket distributors to refund the purchase price of tickets within forty-five days after a cancelled or rescheduled event.
LawCode: Amd ยง23.08, Arts & Cul L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to requiring ticket distributors to refund the purchase price of tickets within forty-five days after a cancelled or rescheduled event
